How It Works:

Product data entry is simple and straightforward, as can be seen in the above screen capture of FRSProductMgr's Products tab. There are many tools provided for getting your data into the application. Once the data has been entered into the application, you can use it to generate on-screen reports (via the Reports tab), and/or create web pages from that data. Web pages are generated by combining your store's data along with some HTML-based template files. The template files allow the person maintaining your web site to format the pages so that they look just like the rest of your web site, yet use the custom data entered into FRSProductMgr.
FRSProductMgr's enormous flexibility is in the way it lets you determine just exactly which data you want to track for each of your products. You can add data columns, remove or hide them, rename them, etc. (some restrictions apply). You can add as many photos as you want for each product. If your products go on sale from time to time, you can set the sale price, and you can even set the date range for when that sale price is in effect.
When you select a product, you can, optionally, provide a full description of the item in a separate, dedicated field below the spreadsheet on the left. Note that you can embed HTML tags within this product description text for added flexibility (primarily of use when products are displayed in product web pages on your web site).

A Few More Features:

You can control the font used in the grids and the Products tab's Product Description edit field.
Your data is not "trapped". It can be exported to an external text, or copied to the Windows Clipboard.
There are many ways to sort your product inventory.
Easily create and print reports.
Import your existing data.
Several data manipulation tools are provided.

Supported OS:

Windows XP, Windows Vista, and Windows 7 and 8
